title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: vignette describes Shiny app works, function , user actions drive data flow. also includes flow charts, sequence diagrams, step--step R code running process outside UI.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: app two primary stages: Load metadata (via Zenodo API fetch RDS upload). Build outputs (metadata table graph) cached records. Records: list Zenodo record objects (returned Zenodo API). Cache: records_val() stores records request metadata. Graph: node/edge data frames generated build_graph().

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: Records: list Zenodo record objects (returned Zenodo API). Cache: records_val() stores records request metadata. Graph: node/edge data frames generated build_graph().

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
code: flowchart TD   A[User clicks Fetch metadata] --> B[build_query + choose per_page]   B --> C[zenodo_search_auth page 1]   C --> D{Response OK?}   D -- No --> E[Capture error and status]   D -- Yes --> F[Store hits and total_hits]   F --> G{More pages needed?}   G -- Yes --> H[zenodo_search_auth next page]   H --> F   G -- No --> I[Trim to max records]   I --> J[Extract keywords]   J --> K[Update keyword selector]   K --> L[Cache records]   L --> M[Trigger graph refresh] flowchart TD   A[User selects RDS file] --> B[readRDS]   B --> C[sanitize_records]   C --> D{Valid records?}   D -- No --> E[Show error]   D -- Yes --> F[Cache records]   F --> G[Trigger graph refresh] flowchart TD   A[Graph refresh triggered] --> B[sanitize_records]   B --> C[filter_by_keywords]   C --> D[extract_relations + build_concept_map]   D --> E[build_graph]   E --> F[Render graph + table]

code: flowchart TD   A[User selects RDS file] --> B[readRDS]   B --> C[sanitize_records]   C --> D{Valid records?}   D -- No --> E[Show error]   D -- Yes --> F[Cache records]   F --> G[Trigger graph refresh]

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
code: flowchart TD   A[Graph refresh triggered] --> B[sanitize_records]   B --> C[filter_by_keywords]   C --> D[extract_relations + build_concept_map]   D --> E[build_graph]   E --> F[Render graph + table]

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
code: sequenceDiagram   participant U as User   participant UI as Shiny UI   participant API as Zenodo API   participant S as Server   U->>UI: Fetch metadata   UI->>S: input$fetch   S->>API: zenodo_search_auth (page 1..n)   API-->>S: JSON records   S->>S: sanitize_records + cache   S->>UI: update keyword choices   S->>UI: graph refresh   U->>UI: Adjust graph filters   UI->>S: graph_trigger   S->>S: build_graph + records_to_table   S-->>UI: Graph + table

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: build_api_url() builds URL string Zenodo API call. zenodo_search() zenodo_search_auth() execute API request parse JSON. zenodo_fetch_record() fetches individual record expansion. zenodo_id_from_identifier() extracts record ids DOIs record URLs. extract_doi() extracts DOI strings identifiers table display. normalize_records() sanitize_records() ensure consistent list valid records. normalize_keywords() standardizes keyword tokens matching. filter_by_keywords() returns subset records based keyword selection. records_to_table() returns display table Title, DOI, related items. build_concept_map() maps concept DOIs latest version fetched set. extract_relations() lists relation types community records. build_graph() creates nodes edges data frames, applying filters colors. build_query() returns Zenodo query string NULL.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: build_api_url() builds URL string Zenodo API call. zenodo_search() zenodo_search_auth() execute API request parse JSON. zenodo_fetch_record() fetches individual record expansion. zenodo_id_from_identifier() extracts record ids DOIs record URLs. extract_doi() extracts DOI strings identifiers table display.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: normalize_records() sanitize_records() ensure consistent list valid records. normalize_keywords() standardizes keyword tokens matching. filter_by_keywords() returns subset records based keyword selection. records_to_table() returns display table Title, DOI, related items.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: build_concept_map() maps concept DOIs latest version fetched set. extract_relations() lists relation types community records. build_graph() creates nodes edges data frames, applying filters colors.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: build_query() returns Zenodo query string NULL.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: example runs steps UI without launching Shiny. Functions internal; use ::: intentionally.
code: library(zenodoMap)  # 1) Build the query community <- "ipbes" query <- zenodoMap:::build_query("")  # 2) Fetch one or more pages from the API per_page <- 25 raw <- zenodoMap:::zenodo_search_auth(   query = query,   community = community,   size = per_page,   page = 1,   token = "" # optional token ) records <- raw$hits$hits  # 3) Sanitize and filter records records <- zenodoMap:::sanitize_records(records) records <- zenodoMap:::filter_by_keywords(records, keywords_text = "")  # 4) Build relation choices and graph community_ids <- vapply(records, function(rec) as.character(rec$id), character(1)) concept_map <- zenodoMap:::build_concept_map(records) relations <- zenodoMap:::extract_relations(records, community_ids, concept_map)  graph <- zenodoMap:::build_graph(   records = records,   depth = 1,   max_expand = length(records),   allowed_relations = relations,   community_ids = community_ids,   community_only = FALSE,   title_map = vapply(records, function(rec) rec$metadata$title %||% "", character(1)),   concept_map = concept_map )  # 5) Inspect outputs head(graph$nodes) head(graph$edges)  # 6) Build the table tbl <- zenodoMap:::records_to_table(records) head(tbl)

title: Zenodo Network Explorer App Guide
text: app keeps dataset list records throughout. Concept DOIs relations mapped latest version found fetched records. use RDS upload, ensure contains list record objects id metadata.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer
Zenodo Network Explorer
text: project structured R package named zenodoMap. can run app :

title: Zenodo Network Explorer
text: Click “Fetch metadata” load records populate keyword list. upload existing records list via “Upload data (RDS)” skip fetching. Adjust graph options (depth, relations, keywords), click “Refresh graph”. Fetching metadata also triggers graph refresh.

title: Zenodo Network Explorer
text: Default community id ipbes (IPBES community). can add extra query terms. Expansion depth selectable (0-2). Expansion follows Zenodo DOIs capped performance. Zenodo limits unauthenticated page size 25; add token raise 100 per page. Keyword filter populated record keywords supports multi-select. Relation type filter optional; select “” include every relation. Nodes colored community vs external deposits; enable “community--community links” hide external nodes/edges. Use “Save data (RDS)” choose save location fetched metadata (requires shinyFiles). Metadata table uses DT package. DOI columns table clickable; related items include relation label. Concept DOIs relations mapped latest version found fetched records.
